title: Add setReadOnly(String ...) to ConnectionImpl
description: When using OpenLink ODBC-JDBC bridge on Windows, it tries to run the method ConnectionImpl.setReadOnly(String ...). The spec says that setReadOnly(boolean ...) is required. This causes the bridge to fail on Windows.
